sys_script_include.name: Autopopulate_catalog_item

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_0fd2b1a6933fb110d0ac703efaba107d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_994488_hr.Autopopulate_catalog_item</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Autopopulate_catalog_item</name><script><![CDATA[var Autopopulate_catalog_item = Class.create();
Autopopulate_catalog_item.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    type: 'Autopopulate_catalog_item',
	populateEmployeeDetails: function(employee_leaving) {
		var userGR = newGlideRecord('sys_user');
		if (userGR.get(employee_leaving)) {
			g_form.setValue('location',userGR.loocation);
			g_form.setValue('contact_number',userGR.phone);
			g_form.setValue('email',userGR.email);
		}
	},
	

});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-20 21:24:09</sys_created_on><sys_id>0fd2b1a6933fb110d0ac703efaba107d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autopopulate_catalog_item</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Human Resource" source="x_994488_hr">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Human Resource">c90746c593033110d0ac703efaba1028</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_0fd2b1a6933fb110d0ac703efaba107d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-20 21:24:09</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
